testcase.brief: first come first bind basic func check
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -config a ssid with ppsk -enable ppsk-server -enable mac binding
Test Procedure: -client A uses a ppsk which never used before to connect to ssid -client A uses the same ppsk to reconnect -client B uses the same ppsk to connect

step.ssh: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "hive ${hive.name} password aerohive" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "security-object ppsk" -v "security-object ppsk security protocol-suite wpa-tkip-psk ascii-key aerohive" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk default-psk-disabled" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk ppsk-server ${ap2.mgt0.ipset}" -v "user ppsk_user" -v "user ppsk_user password aerohive" -v "user-group userGroup" -v "user ppsk_user group userGroup"

-v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "hive ${hive.name} password aerohive" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "user-group userGroup user-attribute 1" -v "user-group userGroup vlan-id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "user-profile ttt vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "no user-group userGroup psk-format character-pattern digits" -v "no user-group userGroup psk-format character-pattern special-characters" -v "user-group userGroup psk-format combo-pattern and" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk mac-binding-enable" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} user-group userGroup" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} max-client 32" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ppsk" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"

-v "security-object ppsk" -v "security-object ppsk security protocol-suite wpa-tkip-psk ascii-key aerohive" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk default-psk-disabled" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk ppsk-server ${ap2.mgt0.ipset}" -v "user ppsk_user" -v "user ppsk_user password aerohive" -v "user-group userGroup" -v "user ppsk_user group userGroup"

-v "user-group userGroup user-attribute 1" -v "user-group userGroup vlan-id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "user-profile ttt vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "no user-group userGroup psk-format character-pattern digits" -v "no user-group userGroup psk-format character-pattern special-characters" -v "user-group userGroup psk-format combo-pattern and" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk mac-binding-enable" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} user-group userGroup" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} max-client 32" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ppsk" -v "interface wifi0 radio channel 1"
-v "_debug auth all" -v "no _debug auth excessive" -v "clear log all" -v "clear arp-cache"
-v "_debug auth all" -v "no _debug auth excessive" -v "clear log all" -v "clear arp-cache"

step.desc: -Show logging buffered to check binding relationship is be created
step.log-match: -p "(?i)auth recv ppsk server respond mac-binding query for sta\(${sta1.tif.mac}\) ACCEPT \(rc=1\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
-p "(?i)auth goto ppsk server\(${ap2.mgt0.ipset}\) query mac-binding for sta\(${sta1.tif.mac}\)\(type:10\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: -Check the auth procedure on ppsk server
step.log-match: -p "(?i)mac-binding enabled, try to create mac-binding for sta\(mac=${sta1.tif.mac}, ssid=${ssid.name}\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: -Show logging buffered on ap1,the binding relationship should be passed
step.log-match: -p "(?i)auth recv ppsk server respond mac-binding query for sta\(${sta1.tif.mac}\) ACCEPT \(rc=1\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
-p "(?i)auth goto ppsk server\(${ap2.mgt0.ipset}\) query mac-binding for sta\(${sta1.tif.mac}\)\(type:10\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: -Show logging buffered on ap2,the binding relationship should be passed
-Show logging buffered on ap1,the sta2 can’t connect successfull
step.log-match: -p "(?i)ah_auth_mb_disassociate_sta: disconnect Sta\(${sta2.tif.mac}\) under SSID\(${ssid.name}\) for user\(ppsk_user\) reject" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
-p "(?i)ah_auth_macbind_msg_recv: auth recv ppsk server respond mac-binding query for sta\(${sta2.tif.mac}\) NOT ACCEPT \(rc=0\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: -Show logging buffered on ap2,the sta2 can’t connect successfull
step.log-match: -p "(?i)ah_auth_macbind_msg_recv: auth ppsk server respond ${ap1.mgt0.ip} mac-binding query result for sta\(${sta2.tif.mac}\) NOT ACCEPT \(rc=0\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
-p "(?i)ah_auth_mb_create: mac-binding enabled, try to create mac-binding for sta\(mac=${sta2.tif.mac}, ssid=${ssid.name}\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
